title: (x) trashy script "Wild Lights" - Selfish {Jarrod}
content:
I’ve seen this messy script so much lately that i almost don’t want to use it... still i NEED it. Please help.  
Thank You.

Trinon

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [messy script.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080121024841/http:/typophile.com/files/messy%20script.jpg) | 123.83 KB |

 [‹ Looking for a circus-style Tuscan](http://web.archive.org/web/20080121024841/http:/typophile.com/node/15195 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Wallpaper/Spruce font - custom font, Chalet Book {Dav, Marc O} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080121024841/http:/typophile.com/node/15278 "Go to next forum topic")
author: trinon

comments.content:
it looks like “selfish” or “porcelain” by eduardo recife. his website is called “misprinted type” and is easy to google.

begsini

Good call, Jarrod. It’s [Eduardo Recife](http://web.archive.org/web/20080121024841/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Eduardo%252BRecife)’s **Selfish** , available from his [Misprinted Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20080121024841/http:/misprintedtype.com/v3/fonts.php) library, a collection of grunge type of exceptional quality. And they’re free to boot! :^)
